opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 23rd day of July, 1997, i t is ORDERED that the Superior Court’s decision is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Frank J. Madey, for George J. Balikian.
John E. Freund, III, for Reliance Insurance Co.
Michael J. Plevyak, for Federal Insurance Co.
